byline.original: By MIKE IVES and MICHELLE INNIS
byline.contributor: Mike Ives reported from Hong Kong, and Michelle Innis from Sydney, Australia.

lead_paragraph: Nine men, including one said to be an aide to a cabinet minister, shed their clothes to reveal briefs that featured Malaysia’s flag.

headline.print_headline: 9 Race Fans, Nearly Nude, Are Arrested in Malaysia
headline.main: Australians Arrested in Malaysia After Stripping to Briefs at Grand Prix

snippet: Nine men, including one said to be an aide to a cabinet minister, shed their clothes to reveal briefs that featured Malaysia’s flag....
abstract: Nine Australian men are arrested in Malaysia after stripping down to briefs printed with Malaysian flag to celebrate Australian driver Daniel Ricciardo winning Malaysian Grand Prix; are being investigated on suspicion of indecency and intent to provoke breach of peace; among men is Jack Walker, adviser to Australian defense Min Christopher Pyne.
